page.title: 07TOWNS. OLDHAM
page.content: OLDHAM IS A TOWN WITH FRIENDLY PEOPLE. MANY PEOPLE ARE UNEMPLOYED IN OLDHAM BUT QUITE A LOT OF PEOPLE WORK IN ENGINEERING.THERE ARE BINGO HALLS AND A LOT OF PUBS IN OLDHAM.ABOUT 80% OF THE PEOPLE ARE WHITE BRITISH AND 20% OTHER NATIONALITIES.MANY PEOPLE LIVE IN TERRACED HOUSES.SPORT IS VERY POPULAR.THERE ARE PROFESSIONAL SOCCER AND RUGBY TEAMS AND A LARGE SPORTS CENTRE.WORK PLACES INCLUDE SLUMBERLAND WHO MAKE BEDS,FERRANTIES WHO MAKE ELECTRICAL GOODS AND SEDDONS WHO MAKE LORRIES.THERE ARE PLENTY OF LARGE STORES LIKE HILLARDS,PRESTO,TESCO,ASDA,LITTLEWOODS ,BOOTS,C+A AND MOTHERCARE.IT IS A BUSY TOWN WHERE ROADS FROM YORKSHIRE AND LANCASHIRE MEET AND A RAILWAY LINE RUNS THROUGH ON ITS WAY TO MANCHESTER.
